parameters.query:
SELECT 
  id, 
  session_id, 
  user_id, 
  role, 
  content, 
  metadata, 
  created_at 
FROM chat_history 
WHERE session_id = '{{$json.session_id}}' 
ORDER BY created_at DESC 
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  query_template,
  parameters,
  dataset_id,
  description
FROM query_templates
WHERE intent_type = '{{$json.analysis.primary_intent}}'
  AND active = true
ORDER BY priority DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT 
  MAX(period_start) as last_data,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - MAX(period_start)))/3600 as hours_old
FROM data_records
WHERE dataset_id = '{{$json.dataset_id}}'
  AND period_start >= NOW() - INTERVAL '48 hours'

INSERT INTO chat_history (
  session_id, 
  user_id, 
  role, 
  content, 
  metadata, 
  created_at
) VALUES (
  '{{$json.session_id}}',
  '{{$json.user_id || "anonymous"}}',
  'user',
  '{{$json.message || $json.query || $json.text || $json.chatInput}}',
  '{{JSON.stringify($json.metadata || {})}}',
  NOW()
)
RETURNING id, session_id, role, content, created_at;
